        <general>

          <identifier>

            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020203</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">¿Cómo se han incorporado a nuestra lengua?</string>
            <string language="en">How did they become part of Spanish?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie standen sie Teil Spanischen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment sont-ils devenus une partie d'Espagnol ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como assentaram bem na parte do espanhol?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come hanno stato bene alla parte dello Spagnolo?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς έγιναν μέρος των ισπανικών;</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Epígrafe del tema sobre las expresiones latinas. Se habla de cómo se usan actualmente.</string>
            <string language="en">This is a section of the lesson on Latin expressions. It explains how they are currently used.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">incorporación a nuestra lengua</string>
            <string language="en">Incorporation into our Spanish language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">latín</string>
            <string language="en">Latin</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Kapitel der Lektion auf lateinischen 
Ausdrücken. Es erklärt, wie sie aktuell benutzt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une section de la leçon sur les expressions 
latines. Elle explique comment elles sont actuel utilisées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma seção da lição nas expressões latin. 
Explica como são usados atualmente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una sezione della lezione sulle espressioni 
latine. Spiega come attualmente sono usate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα τμήμα του μαθήματος στις λατινικές 
εκφράσεις. Εξηγεί πώς χρησιμοποιούνται αυτήν την περίοδο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesellschaftsgründung in unsere spanische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lateinisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Incorporation dans notre langue espagnole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Latin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Incorporação em nossa língua espanhola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Latin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Incorporazione nella nostra lingua spagnola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Latino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενσωμάτωση στην ισπανική γλώσσα μας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λατινικά</string>
          </keyword>
